description: Mustache Mike’s Italian Ice serves a frozen delicacy that’s silky smooth, creamy and delicious…you’ll swear its ice cream!  Our Italian Ices are made from sophisticated ice cream machines that were imported directly from Italy along with using only the finest ingredients and a 100 year old secret recipe to give our customers over 150 unique flavors of the smoothest creamiest Italian ice available anywhere.  It’s a tasty treat that everyone loves to enjoy!What sets us apart from a lot of other frozen treats is that we’re serving a healthier frozen dessert alternative since it contains little calories and is also Dairy Free, Cholesterol Free, Gluten and Fat Free!Some of our flavors: •"Da bomb" (Cherry, lemon, and blue raspberry)•"Big daddy" (Orange, pineapple, and cherry)•Juicy Rancher (Sour apple, watermelon, and lemon)•Strawberry-banana•Watermelon•Mango•Root Beer Float•Chocolate•Sour Apple•Cherry•Lemon•Blue Raspberry •And many, many more!
name: Got Italian Ice
